New Records: Rohit Sharma scored his fifth T20I century, breaking the tie with Glenn Maxwell and Suryakumar Yadav.
Rohit Sharma and Rinku Singh set the highest partnership for India in T20Is with a 190-run stand, surpassing Sanju Samson and Deepak Hooda's 176-run partnership.
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma scored an unbeaten 121 off 69 balls.
Rinku Singh scored an unbeaten 69 off 39 balls.
Ravi Bishnoi took two wickets in the second Super Over to secure the win for India.
Afghanistan's Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Ibrahim Zadran both scored half-centuries.
Gulbadin Naib scored an unbeaten 55 off 23 balls.
Mohammad Nabi contributed 34 runs off 16 balls.
Virat Kohli made a crucial fielding effort to save a potential six in the 17th over.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match featured two Super Overs, a first in T20Is.
